Hadoop MapReduce Change Log

Release 0.22.1 - Unreleased

  • INCOMPATIBLE CHANGES    (none)
  • NEW FEATURES    (none)
  • IMPROVEMENTS    (none)
  • OPTIMIZATIONS    (none)
  • BUG FIXES    (none)

Release 0.22.0 - 2011-11-29

  • INCOMPATIBLE CHANGES    (2)
    1. MAPREDUCE-1866. Removes deprecated class org.apache.hadoop.streaming.UTF8ByteArrayUtils.
      (amareshwari)
    2. MAPREDUCE-1664. Changes the behaviour of the combination of job-acls when they function together with queue-acls.
      (Ravi Gummadi via vinodkv)
  • NEW FEATURES    (4)
    1. MAPREDUCE-1804. Stress-test tool for HDFS introduced in HDFS-708.
      (Joshua Harlow via shv)
    2. MAPREDUCE-220. Collect cpu and memory statistics per task.
      (Scott Chen via acmurthy)
    3. MAPREDUCE-1970. Reed-Solomon code implementation for HDFS RAID.
      (Scott Chen via dhruba)
    4. MAPREDUCE-2169. Integrated Reed-Solomon code with RaidNode.
      (Ramkumar Vadali via schen)
  • IMPROVEMENTS    (69)
    1. MAPREDUCE-2141. Add an "extra data" field to Task for use by Mesos.
      (matei)
    2. MAPREDUCE-2140. Regenerate fair scheduler design doc PDF.
      (matei)
    3. MAPREDUCE-1546. Redirect all job pages to corresponding history page if job is not in JT memory.
      (Scott Chen via sharad)
    4. MAPREDUCE-1092. Enable assertions for unit tests.
      (Eli Collins via cdouglas)
    5. MAPREDUCE-1680. Add a metric recording JobTracker heartbeats processed.
      (Dick King via cdouglas)
    6. MAPREDUCE-1761. FairScheduler allows separate configuration of node and rack locality wait time
      (Scott Chen via dhruba)
    7. MAPREDUCE-1539. authorization checks for inter-server protocol (based on HADOOP-6600)
      (Boris Shkolnik via shv)
    8. MAPREDUCE-1798. Names the configuration keys for the Kerberos principals better.
      (Boris Shkolnik via ddas)
    9. MAPREDUCE-1773. streaming doesn't support jobclient.output.filter.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via vinodkv)
    10. MAPREDUCE-1785. Add streaming config option for not emitting the key.
      (Eli Collins via sharad)
    11. MAPREDUCE-572. If #link is missing from uri format of -cacheArchive then streaming does not throw error.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via vinodkv)
    12. MAPREDUCE-1545. Add timestamps for first task type launched in job summary.
      (Luke Lu via cdouglas)
    13. MAPREDUCE-1543. Add an audit log for authentication events.
      (Amar Kamat and Luke Lu via cdouglas)
    14. MAPREDUCE-1762. Add ability to set values of task counters.
      (Scott Chen via cdouglas)
    15. MAPREDUCE-1533. Reduce overhead of logging and string manipulation during heartbeat processing.
      (Amar Kamat and Dick King via cdouglas)
    16. MAPREDUCE-1516. JobTracker issues delegation tokens only if the user's authentication is Kerberos.
      (Jitendra Pandey via ddas)
    17. MAPREDUCE-647. Update distcp forrest documentation to reflect the changes of HADOOP-5472, MAPREDUCE-642 and HADOOP-5620.
      (Rodrigo Schmidt via szetszwo)
    18. MAPREDUCE-1851. Documents configuration parameters in streaming.
      (amareshwari)
    19. MAPREDUCE-1868. Add a read and connection timeout to JobClient while pulling tasklogs.
      (Krishna Ramachandran via acmurthy)
    20. MAPREDUCE-1778. Ensure failure to setup CompletedJobStatusStore is not silently ignored by the JobTracker.
      (Krishna Ramachandran via acmurthy)
    21. MAPREDUCE-1850. Includes job submit host information (name and ip) in jobconf and jobdetails display
      (Krishna Ramachandran via amareshwari)
    22. MAPREDUCE-1893. Slive with multiple reducers.
      (shv)
    23. MAPREDUCE-1248. Fixes redudant memory copying in StreamKeyValUtil.
      (Ruibang He via amareshwari)
    24. MAPREDUCE-1840. Enhancements to Gridmix benchmark simulating user diversity, queue replay, and task duration for JobTracker load testing. Also includes compatibility with security enhancements, and scalability improvements.
      (Amar Kamat, Rahul Singh, Hong Tang, and cdouglas)
    25. MAPREDUCE-1848. Put number of speculative, data local, rack local tasks in JobTracker metrics.
      (Scott Chen via dhruba)
    26. MAPREDUCE-1935. Makes the Distcp to work in a secure environment.
      (Boris Shkolnik via ddas)
    27. MAPREDUCE-1945. The MapReduce component for HADOOP-6632.
      (Kan Zhang & Jitendra Pandey via ddas)
    28. MAPREDUCE-1936. Modify Gridmix3 to support more tunable parameters for stress submission and sleep jobs.
      (Hong Tang via cdouglas)
    29. MAPREDUCE-1733. Makes pipes applications secure.
      (Jitendra Pandey via ddas)
    30. MAPREDUCE-1566. Adds a configuration attribute using which job clients can specify a credentials file. The tokens from there will be passed to the job.
      (Jitendra Pandey and Owen O'Malley via ddas)
    31. MAPREDUCE-1624. Documents the job credentials and associated details to do with delegation tokens (on the client side).
      (Jitendra Pandey and Devaraj Das via ddas)
    32. MAPREDUCE-1834. TestSimulatorDeterministicReplay timesout on trunk.
      (Hong Tang via mahadev)
    33. MAPREDUCE-1993. Fixes test failure TestTrackerDistributedCacheManagerWithLinuxTaskController.
      (Devaraj Das via amareshwari)
    34. MAPREDUCE-1523. Making Mumak work with Capacity-Scheduler
      (Anirban Das via mahadev)
    35. MAPREDUCE-1920. Enables completed jobstatus store by default.
      (Tom White via amareshwari)
    36. MAPREDUCE-1881. Improve TaskTrackerInstrumentation to enable collection of advanced metrics.
      (Matei Zaharia via acmurthy)
    37. MAPREDUCE-1548. Hadoop archives preserve times and other properties from original files.
      (Rodrigo Schmidt via dhruba)
    38. MAPREDUCE-1517. Supports streaming job to run in the background.
      (Bochun Bai via amareshwari)
    39. MAPREDUCE-1819. RaidNode is now smarter in submitting Raid jobs.
      (Ramkumar Vadali via schen)
    40. MAPREDUCE-2132. A command line option in RaidShell to fix blocks using raid
    41. MAPREDUCE-2147. Remove redundant lines in JobInProgress ctor.
      (Harsh J Chouraria via cutting)
    42. HADOOP-7007. Update the hudson-test-patch ant target to work with the latest test-patch.sh script
      (gkesavan)
    43. MAPREDUCE-1818. RaidNode can specify scheduling parameters.
      (Ramkumar Vadali via schen)
    44. MAPREDUCE-2051. Contribute a fair scheduler preemption system test.
      (Todd Lipcon via tomwhite)
    45. MAPREDUCE-1892. RaidNode can allow layered policies more efficiently.
      (Ramkumar Vadali via schen)
    46. MAPREDUCE-1592. Generate Eclipse's .classpath file from Ivy config.
      (tomwhite via nigel)
    47. MAPREDUCE-2073. TestTrackerDistributedCacheManager should be up-front about requirements on build environment.
      (Todd Lipcon via tomwhite)
    48. MAPREDUCE-2093. Herriot JT and TT clients should vend statistics.
      (cos)
    49. MAPREDUCE-2167. Faster directory traversal for raid node.
      (Ramkumar Vadali via schen)
    50. MAPREDUCE-1931. Gridmix forrest documentation . (Ranjit Mathew via vinodkv).
    51. MAPREDUCE-1878. Add MRUnit documentation.
      (Aaron Kimball via tomwhite)
    52. MAPREDUCE-2180. Add coverage of fair scheduler servlet to system test
      (todd)
    53. MAPREDUCE-2260. Remove auto-generated native build files.
      (rvs via eli)
    54. MAPREDUCE-2314. configure files that are generated as part of the released tarball need to have executable bit set
      (rvs via cos)
    55. MAPREDUCE-1159. Limit Job name in web UI to be 80 char long.
      (Harsh J Chouraria via szetszwo)
    56. MAPREDUCE-2337. Remove dependence of public MapReduce API on classes in server package.
      (tomwhite)
    57. MAPREDUCE-869. Documentation for config to set map/reduce task environment
      (Alejandro Abdelnur via todd)
    58. MAPREDUCE-2410. Add entry to streaming FAQ about how streaming reducers receive keys.
      (Harsh J Chouraria via todd)
    59. MAPREDUCE-2383. Improve documentation of DistributedCache methods
      (Harsh J Chouraria via todd)
    60. MAPREDUCE-2222. Ivy resolve force mode should be turned off by default.
      (Luke Lu via tomwhite)
    61. MAPREDUCE-2103. task-controller shouldn't require o-r permissions.
      (todd via eli)
    62. MAPREDUCE-2499. MR part of HADOOP-7291.
      (eli)
    63. MAPREDUCE-2505. Explain how to use ACLs in the fair scheduler.
      (matei via eli)
    64. MAPREDUCE-2502. JobSubmitter should use mapreduce.job.maps instead of its deprecated equivalent.
      (eli via todd)
    65. MAPREDUCE-2372. TaskLogAppender mechanism shouldn't be set up in log4j.properties
      (todd)
    66. MAPREDUCE-2516. Rename webinterface.private.actions to mapreduce.jobtracker.webinterface.trusted
      (Ari Rabkin via todd)
    67. HADOOP-7106. Reorganize project SVN layout to "unsplit" the projects.
      (todd, nigel)
    68. MAPREDUCE-3039. Upgrade to Avro 1.5.3.
      (Joep Rottinghuis via shv)
    69. MAPREDUCE-3138. Add a utility to help applications bridge changes in Context Objects APIs due to MAPREDUCE-954.
      (omalley via acmurthy)
  • OPTIMIZATIONS    (3)
    1. MAPREDUCE-1354. Enhancements to JobTracker for better performance and scalability.
      (Arun C. Murthy & Richard King via acmurthy)
    2. MAPREDUCE-1829. JobInProgress.findSpeculativeTask should use min() to find the candidate instead of sort().
      (Scott Chen via vinodkv)
    3. MAPREDUCE-2026. Make JobTracker.getJobCounters() and JobInProgress.getCounters() aquire locks in a shorter time period.
      (Joydeep Sen Sarma via schen)
  • BUG FIXES    (138)
    1. MAPREDUCE-1845. FairScheduler.tasksToPreempt() can return negative number.
      (Scott Chen via matei)
    2. MAPREDUCE-1707. TaskRunner can get NPE in getting ugi from TaskTracker.
      (Vinod Kumar Vavilapalli)

      (ddas)

      (Boris Shkolnik via ddas)

      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via cdouglas)

      (Jitendra Nath Pandey via ddas)

      (Boris Shkolnik via shv)

      (Dick King via cdouglas)
